perfect !

Thanks

All good except could you put the questionnaire buttons down near the section on filling out the questionnaires it’s just a bit further down the page

Cheers Matt
Cool will check as soon as I get home

Hi Matt,


It's all updated and live. Can you please confirm if the location of the questionnaire buttons is correct, just want to be 100% sure.


Thanks

Perfect, I'll do this changes quickly and make the pages linked and live in the website.


I'll let you know once it's live.


Thanks

HI Joao,


Thats great. Can you have this one visible in the left hand page and then put a link on this page to both the metabolic questionnaire and the normal questionnaire . In the section of the information page where I tell them to fill one out.


The normal questionnaire for anaesthetic should also remain as normal in the left hand column.


if that make sense

cheers

matt

Hi Matt,


We have created the 'Metabolic Clinic' page.


It's published but not linked anywhere in the website, so only someone that knows the url can view it.


Can you please let us know if this page will be accessible from the left menu?
Is the Preoperative Metabolic Questionnaire accessible from the left menu or linked from the Metabolic Clinic page? (If from Metabolic Clinic Page, please advise where should we place the link)


Please let us know if you're happy with the page.


https://mrandmrsgas.com.au/metabolic-clinic/

Thanks
Heath Maguire I didn't know about this page...I thought we only had to do the form... I'll put something together but it's better if you review after..
Joao Henriques If you scroll up, there's a word doc called metabolic.... That one!
Heath Maguire  Which information page????

HI heath if possible could the information page go up soon and then the questionnaires can be linked in from that.

Cheers

matt


On 12 Apr 2018, at 5:04 pm, Heath from WP Perk <heath.maguire@wp-perk.intercom-mail.com> wrote:


Hi Matt,

Great news, the site has been migrated to our Perk Professional Plan server and extra security layer added.

We have also created the new form. You can view it here: https://mrandmrsgas.com.au/preoperative-and-metabolic-questionnaire/

Please review and let me know which email address you would like to receive the notification once a form is submitted. I will also create a quick 'how to' video showing you how to login and view/download an entry.

The two questions around family history of heart disease and diabetes have also been added.

Thanks

Thanks

2. Do you have a family history of diabetes ?
